page.title: 07LOCAL GOVERNMENT IN PENTON
page.content: Warwicksland is in Penton,N.of Carlisle.The Parish Council is Nicholforest with 276 people on the electoral roll.From Parish Council there is a structure through District,County Councils leading to Central Government in Westminster. The area is sparsely populated with farming being the main industry.Tourists visit our area in the summer months with locals offering a variety of accomodation with bed and breakfast, cottages,chalets,caravans and self-catering units.A County Structure Plan forms the basis of planning policy to provide consultation for proposed development. Conservation is always considered. The P.C. report to D.C. and C.C. on matters concerning road works,signposts,public footpaths etc.
